projects.name: Misty Blunch's Portfolio v2
projects.description: High-accessibility portfolio built with best practices and a focus on user experience. Includes multi-language support (i18n), theme management, and fluid animations for immersive navigation.

projects.name: Yapo - Favorite Songs
projects.description: Query service for iTunes API integration. Enables user data persistence and management of personalized music collections.

projects.name: Card Tokenization
projects.description: Serverless microservice for secure financial data processing. Implements encryption, card validation, and high-availability token caching.

projects.name: Minxy Travel
projects.description: Basic ERP system for transport logistics management. Centralized fleet control, driver assignment, and corporate route optimization.

projects.name: Elegimos.pe
projects.description: Political data analysis platform for the 2021 Elections featuring complex filters and a computer vision module for facial emotional recognition of candidates.

projects.name: Blockchain Transaction Generator
projects.description: Distributed architecture for secure digital asset management. Implements validation protocols for immutable sales records, withdrawals, and transfers.

projects.name: Susy Todos Manager
projects.description: Collaborative task management application with cross-user state synchronization and relational data persistence.

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe C++
projects.description: Console-based game logic implementation with dynamic board scalability algorithms developed in C++.

projects.name: Blog with Redux
projects.description: Single Page Application (SPA) focused on complex global state management using Redux for CRUD post workflows.

projects.name: UTEC Cybersecurity Club Web
projects.description: Institutional information platform designed for promoting workshops and events within the cybersecurity community.

projects.name: Platzi Conf Badges
projects.description: Dynamic registration system and credential printing for technology events.

projects.name: Movies App
projects.description: Real-time data consumption web client integrated with TheMovieDB API, focusing on responsive interfaces.

projects.name: Misty Blunch's Portfolio v1
projects.description: Initial exploration of frontend architectures and responsive design. Native internationalization implementation without external frameworks.

projects.name: Yearbook
projects.description: Educational resource developed for a programming workshop at Tel√©sforo Catacora School. Responsive interface focused on teaching web layout and document structure fundamentals.

projects.name: Leauty Web Scraping
projects.description: Data extraction tool designed to optimize academic resource searches. Transforms raw Libgen data into an intuitive and efficient interface.

projects.name: Styve App
projects.description: Hybrid mobile platform for collaborative learning (P2P), integrating real-time services with Firebase.
